item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to be; to act as; manage; withstand; when; during; ought; should; match equally; equal; same; obstruct; just at (a time or place); on the spot; right; just at
2: at or in the very same...; to pawn; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; replace; represent
item.A:
traditional: 當
1: dāng 2: dàng
当时 (當時) dāngshí then; at that time; while 适当 (適當) shìdàng suitable; appropriate

item.Q:
Write the character:
year
item.A:
nián
青年 qīngnián youth

item.Q:
Write the character:
appear; present; now; existing; current
item.A:
traditional: 現
xiàn
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character:
before; in front; ago; former; previous; earlier; front
item.A:
qián
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

item.Q:
Write the character:
(the) most; -est
item.A:
zuì
最后 (最後) zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

item.Q:
Write the character:
reason; logic; science; inner principle or structure
item.A:
lǐ
管理 guǎnlǐ to supervise; to manage; to administer; management; administration

item.Q:
Write the character:
classics; sacred book; scripture; to pass through; to undergo; longitude; surname
item.A:
traditional: 經
jīng
经济 (經濟) jīngjì economy; economic

item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sun; date; day of the month; abbr. for Japan
item.A:
rì
日本 Rìběn Japan; Japanese

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: just (right); main; upright; straight; correct; principle
2: Chinese 1st month of year
item.A:
1: zhèng 2: zhēng
正确 (正確) zhèngquè correct; proper 正月 zhēngyuè first month of the lunar new year

item.Q:
Write the character:
again; once more; re-; second; another
item.A:
zài
再生 zàishēng to be reborn; to regenerate

item.Q: 当

traditional: 當

2: at or in the very same...; to pawn; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; replace; represent
当时 (當時) dāngshí then; at that time; while 适当 (適當) shìdàng suitable; appropriate

nián
